'''Trust''' is used to increase the Trust Rank of the player in the [[Serenitea Pot]] System.

Trust is gained by creating a [[Furnishing]] item for the first time. Depending on the quality of the [[blueprint]] chosen (2/3/4 stars), 30/60/90 trust is granted.
